name: The lost path
description:
Controls: Arrows / WASD / ZQSD to move. SPACE to navigate in menus. ESC to pause

The lost path is a game made in one week for the 3rd Nokia3310 game jam.

Restrictions were :

-Screen size is : 84x48 pixels
-Using only 2 colors (the one that corresponds to Nokia's screen)
-Monophonic sounds
